text: (visvasavantayini!) obagen yam kisivekuta maranaya langa vuvahot ohu vastuva (depala) athæra dama (maranayata pat vanneku vasayenda) sitiyahot (ohu tamange) demavpiyantada, gnatintada, sadharana andamin (depala sendu vana se) antima kæmætta (marana sasanaya kimata) niyama karanu læba ætteya. (meya) bhaya bhaktikayin mata anivaryaya yutukamaki
